== Impedance Control (HIRO NX) ==

=== Via python client ===

Some utility functions are defined in [[https://github.com/start-jsk/rtmros_hironx/blob/hydro-devel/hironx_ros_bridge/src/hironx_ros_bridge/hironx_client.py|hironx_client.py]].
You can activate impedance control by following commands (for example through [[https://github.com/start-jsk/rtmros_hironx/blob/hydro-devel/hironx_ros_bridge/scripts/hironx.py|hironx.py]]:

{{{
$ ipython -i `rospack find hironx_ros_bridge`/scripts/hironx.py
: (initialize ipython terminal)
IN[1]: robot.startImpedance('rarm')
IN[2]: robot.startImpedance('larm')
}}}

Also you can deactivate with follows:
{{{
IN[3]: robot.stopImpedance('rarm')
IN[4]: robot.stopImpedance('larm')
}}}
